headline.print_headline: A Cobbler Is No Longer Barefoot
headline.main: Sarah Smith and Robert Walmsley: A Matchmaker Finds a Love of Her Own

byline.contributor: Susan Puckett contributed reporting from Atlanta.

snippet: It took compromise and help from online dating for the founder of Eight at Eight Dinner Club to meet her husband.
abstract: Vows column on wedding of Sarah Smith and Robert Walmsley.
lead_paragraph: It took compromise and help from online dating for the founder of Eight at Eight Dinner Club to meet her husband.
